result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael P Kerns

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Michael P Kerns
Current: 646 1st Street, Clayton, WI 54004 United States  (Effective: 07-11-2022)
Prior: 37 Violet Street, Almena, WI 54001

8:02 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael P Kerns in court.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Michael P Kerns.
Covers 21CF396, 21CM157 and 22CM17
Court relates.  Defendant relates.  Attorney Rockow relates.  Defendant relates.  8:06 Court in recess 

Case recalled at 8:58 AM.  Covers 21CF396, 21CM157, 22CM17, 21CF322, 21CM60, 21CM178 and 21CM179

Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights presented and discussed.

21CM178
Count 1 - Dismiss
Count 2 - State moves to amend to 9.11 county ordinance damage to property. Court grants amendment. No contest plea entered. Court finds guilty and orders $267.50 forfeiture - 60 DTP.

21CM179 - DRI

21CM157
Count 1 - DRI
Count 2 - Guilty plea entered.

21CF322
Count 1 - DRI
Count 2 - Guilty plea entered.
Count 3 - Guilty plea entered.
Counts 4, 5, 6 - DRI
Count 7 - Guilty plea entered.

21CF396
Count 1 - Guilty plea entered.
Counts 2-6 - DRI

22CM17 - DRI

22CM60
Count 1 - DRI
Count 2 - Guilty plea entered.

State relates.  Court finds pleas are knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily given and finds the defendant guilty.  Court orders PSI in 21CF396 to include all of the pleas entered this morning with the exception of 21CM178.  State relates.  Attorney Rockow relates.  Court relates.  Bond continued.  Court orders Defendant to contact Probation office within 48 hours.  Address and phone number (2 numbers) updated.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Response from Judge Bitney to Counsel RE:  Jury not to be called in on 07/11/22, but Jury Trial is to remain on the calendar.
Request to Not Bring in a Jury from Attorney Rockow.
Jury trial on July 11, 2022 at 08:00 am.

2:00 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael P Kerns in court.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Michael P Kerns. 
Michael Kerns COVERS 21CF322, 21CF396, 21CM157, 21CM178, 21CM179, 22CM17 & 22CM60. 
Attorney Rockow relates Defendant has requested that he be discharged as his attorney.  Court relates.  Attorney Rockow relates they are at an impass that he cannot represent Defendant going forward.  State relates and withdraws all plea offers and requests Jury Trials be set.  Defendant relates.  Court relates and leaves Attorney Rockow appointed as Defendant's attorney for now and sets jury trials.

21CF396 - #1 Jury Trial set before Judge Bitney for 07/11/2022 at 8:00 a.m.  Proposed Jury Instructions, Witness Lists, Verdict Forms, any Motions and Notice of Intent to Use Video are to be filed no later than 1 week prior.  Back up Jury Trials are to be set for same date/time for 21CM157 and 22CM17.

Jury Trials are to be set before Judge Boyle for case numbers 21CF322, 21CM178, 21CM179 and 22CM60.  Attorney Rockow to contact JA.

10:06 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael P Kerns in court.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Michael P Kerns. 
THIS COVERS 21CF396, 21CM157, 22CM17, 21CF322, 21CM178, 21CM179, and 22CM60. 

Request for a plea hearing to encompass all files. All files set for plea hearing on 5/3/22 at 2PM before Judge Bitney. Must appear in person. Bonds continue.
Plea hearing scheduled for May 3, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

1:00 PM Defendant Michael P Kerns appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Dustin Rockow appeared (for today only) for Michael Kerns.  Attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for State of Wisconsin. 

This court record covers 22CM60, 21CF322, 21CM178, 21CM179, 21CM157 and 22CM17.

Court relates. Michael Kerns relates that he contacted PD and left a voice mail. Attorney Rockow relates that he will be representing him. 

1:03 pm Defendant and Attorney Rockow enter breakout room. 
1:06 Court resumes. Attorney Rockow relates and defendant enters not guilty plea on both counts. Asks for a signature bond. State relates. Court Orders Cash bond $500. 

State moves for $500 cash bail in 22CM60 with added condition of no contact with B.M.F or  address confidential. State also moves to modify bonds in case numbers 21CF322, 212CM178, 21CM179, 21CM157 and 22CM17 to add the conditions of no contact with B.M.F or  address confidential, WI. Court grants.

Minute sheet and bond scanned to jail.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 

Must have no contact with (Address confidential).

4/7/2022 THIS BOND IS AMENDED TO ADD THE CONDITIONS OF: DEFENDANT MUST HAVE NO CONTACT WITH B.M.F OR THE ADDRESS AT (Address confidential). ALL OTHER CONDITIONS OF PREVIOUS BOND REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

11:12 AM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael P Kerns in court.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Michael P Kerns. 
COVERS 22CM17, 21CM157 & 21CF396.
21CF396 - ARGN - Formal reading of Information waived.  Not guilty plea/s entered. 
All files set to 04/15/2022 at 10:00 a.m. before Judge Boyle.  Address and phone number confirmed.  Bond continues.
Hearing scheduled for April 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.

9:07 AM Prosecuting attorney John A Rafa Todd appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Michael P Kerns appeared in court, Attorney Andrew T Knaak appeared by video for Michael P Kerns. 
THIS COVERS 21CF322, 21CM178, 21CM179, 21CM157, 21CF396, and 22CM17. 

Request for reset. All files reset. 
21CF396, 21CM157, and 22CM17 set before Judge Bitney 3/25/22 at 10 AM. 
21CF322, 21CM178, and 21CM179 set before Judge Boyle 4/13/22 at 10 AM. 
Phone number updated.
Hearing scheduled for April 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.
